Entries.DialogueText: Well hello there! I'm Gus, chef and owner of the Stardrop Saloon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well hello there! I'm Gus, chef and owner of the Stardrop Saloon.

Entries.DialogueText: Stop in if you need any refreshments. I've always got hot coffee and cold beer at the ready. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stop in if you need any refreshments. I've always got hot coffee and cold beer at the ready.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh wow, thank you! I'm tempted to drink all of it, but I'm going to save some for the saloon. I bet I could make an interesting cocktail with this!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh wow, thank you! I'm tempted to drink all of it, but I'm going to save some for the saloon. I bet I could make an interesting cocktail with this!

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... Ah. Exquisite cuisine. You know what I like, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... Ah. Exquisite cuisine. You know what I like, .

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* sniff* ... that sharp smell!
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* sniff* ... that sharp smell!

Entries.DialogueText: *slurp* *slurp* ... that zesty taste! That gritty texture!
Entries.DisplayPattern: *slurp* *slurp* ... that zesty taste! That gritty texture!

Entries.DialogueText: It can only be gourmet tomato salt! I'll trade you for it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It can only be gourmet tomato salt! I'll trade you for it.

Entries.DialogueText: I saw the weather report last night. It really gave me a scare! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw the weather report last night. It really gave me a scare!

Entries.DialogueText: Are there monsters out there? What's happening?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are there monsters out there? What's happening?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad that's over. Running the saloon is enough to worry about, I don't need exotic weather in my life!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad that's over. Running the saloon is enough to worry about, I don't need exotic weather in my life!

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... These rains have a particular smell. Have you noticed? Almost like freshly minced herbs...
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... These rains have a particular smell. Have you noticed? Almost like freshly minced herbs...

Entries.DialogueText: Lewis tells me your tomatoes have ripened. That's great news!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Lewis tells me your tomatoes have ripened. That's great news!

Entries.DialogueText: ...Just imagine what the culinary world would be like without tomatoes...
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Just imagine what the culinary world would be like without tomatoes...

Entries.DialogueText: It's important to me that people can eat healthy, delicious meals. Unfortunately, in today's world, that's not so easy for everyone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's important to me that people can eat healthy, delicious meals. Unfortunately, in today's world, that's not so easy for everyone.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey {Farmer_Name}, just want to say that I'm happy for you and %spouse.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey , just want to say that I'm happy for you and .

Entries.DialogueText: Emily has a real pep in her step lately... I wonder why? *wink*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Emily has a real pep in her step lately... I wonder why? *wink*

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I'm sorry to hear about the break-up... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I'm sorry to hear about the break-up...

Entries.DialogueText: If you need company, you're always welcome at the Saloon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you need company, you're always welcome at the Saloon.

Entries.DialogueText: Another failed marriage? Well, it happens. Guess I'll be seeing you at the Saloon more often... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Another failed marriage? Well, it happens. Guess I'll be seeing you at the Saloon more often...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you really pulled through with those eggs. The omelet turned out great, thanks to you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you really pulled through with those eggs. The omelet turned out great, thanks to you!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}! Glad you're here. I'm gonna be serving up some good stuff from behind the bar.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, ! Glad you're here. I'm gonna be serving up some good stuff from behind the bar.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll see you back home, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll see you back home, .

Entries.DialogueText: Meet me at the bar if you need a beverage.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Meet me at the bar if you need a beverage.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, need a drink? I've got some special beverages that showcase local ingredients from this island. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, need a drink? I've got some special beverages that showcase local ingredients from this island.

Entries.DialogueText: These might be the best crab cakes I've ever made...
Entries.DisplayPattern: These might be the best crab cakes I've ever made...

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah, I know a lot about the people living here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah, I know a lot about the people living here.

Entries.DialogueText: That's one of the benefits of being a bartender. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's one of the benefits of being a bartender.

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I hear too much...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sometimes I hear too much...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. I heard what you did for Pam. That was really really nice of you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. I heard what you did for Pam. That was really really nice of you!

Entries.DialogueText: Sadly, I don't think it will get her to cut back on the 'beverages'...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sadly, I don't think it will get her to cut back on the 'beverages'...

Entries.DialogueText: I saw Pam earlier today... she was grinning from ear to ear! She said someone bought her a new house!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw Pam earlier today... she was grinning from ear to ear! She said someone bought her a new house!

Entries.DialogueText: Whoever it was, they truly deserve the best! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoever it was, they truly deserve the best!

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to the Stardrop Saloon! Can I get you anything?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to the Stardrop Saloon! Can I get you anything?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there, {Farmer_Name}. Make yourself at home.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there, . Make yourself at home.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, Pierre!/Now, what do I need.../Ah, that looks good!/Makin' my special sauce tonight!/Pierre! What's fresh?/Pierre! Waddya got for me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, Pierre!/Now, what do I need.../Ah, that looks good!/Makin' my special sauce tonight!/Pierre! What's fresh?/Pierre! Waddya got for me?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there {Farmer_Name}. I'm glad to see you! You're always welcome here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there . I'm glad to see you! You're always welcome here.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi! Please relax and enjoy yourself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi! Please relax and enjoy yourself.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you look like you could use a beverage.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you look like you could use a beverage.

Entries.DialogueText: Business has been really good tonight. I'm pleased.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Business has been really good tonight. I'm pleased.

Entries.DialogueText: I sell different dishes each week, so make sure and check in every now and then!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I sell different dishes each week, so make sure and check in every now and then!

Entries.DialogueText: You might taste something spectacular. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You might taste something spectacular.

Entries.DialogueText: Just let me know if you have any allergies. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just let me know if you have any allergies.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, see you around.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, see you around.

Entries.DialogueText: Emily's been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without her!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Emily's been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without her!

Entries.DialogueText: I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.

Entries.DialogueText: Pam and Clint come into the saloon almost every night.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pam and Clint come into the saloon almost every night.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd probably go out of business if they stopped coming. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd probably go out of business if they stopped coming.

Entries.DialogueText: So make sure you don't drive them away!
Entries.DisplayPattern: So make sure you don't drive them away!

Entries.DialogueText: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes he glances over at Emily with a nervous look. Hmmm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sometimes he glances over at Emily with a nervous look. Hmmm.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.

Entries.DialogueText: Pam comes into the saloon almost every night and drinks way too much beer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pam comes into the saloon almost every night and drinks way too much beer.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah well, I shouldn't pass judgment on my customers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah well, I shouldn't pass judgment on my customers.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there, {Farmer_Name}. If you're ever thirsty, the Saloon is the place to be.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there, . If you're ever thirsty, the Saloon is the place to be.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't actually drink very much myself. I'm mainly doing this to make a living.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't actually drink very much myself. I'm mainly doing this to make a living.

Entries.DialogueText: Although I do enjoy a taste of the Stardew Valley vintage from time to time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Although I do enjoy a taste of the Stardew Valley vintage from time to time.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you much of a chef, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you much of a chef, ?

Entries.DialogueText: If you have a kitchen and some recipes, you can cook some useful dishes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you have a kitchen and some recipes, you can cook some useful dishes.

Entries.DialogueText: Home-cooked meals make great gifts, as well.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Home-cooked meals make great gifts, as well.

Entries.DialogueText: Business has been pretty steady thanks to my regular customers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Business has been pretty steady thanks to my regular customers.

Entries.DialogueText: There's nothing like a glass of dry red wine on a day like this, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's nothing like a glass of dry red wine on a day like this, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: I love my job. Hehehe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love my job. Hehehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... what a beautiful day, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... what a beautiful day, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: You know, as the Saloon owner, I hear about everything that's going on in town.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, as the Saloon owner, I hear about everything that's going on in town.

Entries.DialogueText: I remember when you first moved here... everyone was a bit unsure of what to expect.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I remember when you first moved here... everyone was a bit unsure of what to expect.

Entries.DialogueText: A stranger from the city... an unknown personality... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A stranger from the city... an unknown personality...

Entries.DialogueText: One sec...
Entries.DisplayPattern: One sec...

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry, I have to stir this pot every 5 minutes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry, I have to stir this pot every 5 minutes.

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway, what was I saying? Oh yeah... you know, it's like when you're making a sauce...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway, what was I saying? Oh yeah... you know, it's like when you're making a sauce...

Entries.DialogueText: ...If you put in a new spice you could ruin everything! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...If you put in a new spice you could ruin everything!

Entries.DialogueText: ...But then again, there's always a chance you'll create something new and delicious! Right? Hahahaha. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But then again, there's always a chance you'll create something new and delicious! Right? Hahahaha.

Entries.DialogueText: Er... What I'm trying to say is... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er... What I'm trying to say is...

Entries.DialogueText: It's been great having you in town, and I've come to think of you as one of my good friends!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's been great having you in town, and I've come to think of you as one of my good friends!

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway, I came to give you something...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway, I came to give you something...

Entries.DialogueText: I was cleaning out the back room and I found this old Mini-Jukebox. I want you to have it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was cleaning out the back room and I found this old Mini-Jukebox. I want you to have it!

Entries.DialogueText: Received a 'Mini-Jukebox'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Received a 'Mini-Jukebox'

Entries.DialogueText: It's actually an old Do-It-Yourself project of mine, from many years ago. They're pretty easy to make!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's actually an old Do-It-Yourself project of mine, from many years ago. They're pretty easy to make!

Entries.DialogueText: So, just in case you wanted to make more, I brought the blueprints for you...
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, just in case you wanted to make more, I brought the blueprints for you...

Entries.DialogueText: Learned how to craft a 'Mini-Jukebox'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Learned how to craft a 'Mini-Jukebox'

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I'm gonna head home. I gotta get this marinara back on the stove! Have a good one!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I'm gonna head home. I gotta get this marinara back on the stove! Have a good one!

Entries.DialogueText: Great stuff!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Great stuff!

Entries.DialogueText: I still dream of that garlic butter.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I still dream of that garlic butter.

Entries.DialogueText: Me too!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Me too!

Entries.DialogueText: Wait. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wait.

Entries.DialogueText: I know what you were doing, Linus. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know what you were doing, Linus.

Entries.DialogueText: If you need food... just ask. I don't want anyone in Pelican Town to go hungry.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you need food... just ask. I don't want anyone in Pelican Town to go hungry.

Entries.DialogueText: Here. I've got a basket of zucchini fritters for you. Just make sure you dip them in my spicy marinara! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here. I've got a basket of zucchini fritters for you. Just make sure you dip them in my spicy marinara!

Entries.DialogueText: Go on... take it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Go on... take it.

Entries.DialogueText: Nice!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nice!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm all ears.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm all ears.

Entries.DialogueText: That sounds pretty good! I could use some quality veggies for the saloon. How much does it cost?
Entries.DisplayPattern: That sounds pretty good! I could use some quality veggies for the saloon. How much does it cost?

Entries.DialogueText: What was that?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What was that?

Entries.DialogueText: Hahaha... for a moment there, I thought I heard, '25,000g'. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hahaha... for a moment there, I thought I heard, '25,000g'.

Entries.DialogueText: Pierre, are you crazy? There's no way I could afford that. I'd have to sell the saloon! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pierre, are you crazy? There's no way I could afford that. I'd have to sell the saloon!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. I'll take your order in a few moments.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. I'll take your order in a few moments.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Unique}
There you go, sir. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There you go, sir.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hello there, buddy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hello there, buddy.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, .

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... I'm just looking over last month's earnings... and it's not looking very good, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... I'm just looking over last month's earnings... and it's not looking very good, .

Entries.DialogueText: The worst thing... and I hate to say this because she's my friend... is Pam! She hasn't paid off her tab in weeks! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The worst thing... and I hate to say this because she's my friend... is Pam! She hasn't paid off her tab in weeks!

Entries.DialogueText: ...But I can't ask her to do it. I know she'll get defensive, and I don't want to hurt her feelings. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But I can't ask her to do it. I know she'll get defensive, and I don't want to hurt her feelings.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, you gotta help me! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: , you gotta help me!

Entries.DialogueText: Er... Well, okay Pam. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er... Well, okay Pam.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, Pam! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, Pam!

Entries.DialogueText: And thank you, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: And thank you, .

Entries.DialogueText: Now, let's get you that drink, Pam. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, let's get you that drink, Pam.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for your help, {Farmer_Name}. This cash is going to be a big help to the saloon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for your help, . This cash is going to be a big help to the saloon.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!

Entries.DialogueText: Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, folks... once again, we're gathered for a very special occasion.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, folks... once again, we're gathered for a very special occasion.

Entries.DialogueText: ...A rare visit from a very dear friend...
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...A rare visit from a very dear friend...

Entries.DialogueText: ...My world-famous giant omelet! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...My world-famous giant omelet!

Entries.DialogueText: Zesty bell pepper, juicy tomato, rich mushroom, and tangy cheese... all enrobed in a blanket of rich, fluffy egg. Dig in, folks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Zesty bell pepper, juicy tomato, rich mushroom, and tangy cheese... all enrobed in a blanket of rich, fluffy egg. Dig in, folks.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy? What do you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy? What do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: Is that a good thing? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is that a good thing?

Entries.DialogueText: Nope... You can thank {Farmer_Name} over at %farm Farm!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nope... You can thank over at Farm!

Entries.DialogueText: Hooo~... Back at it again, huh Willy? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hooo~... Back at it again, huh Willy?

Entries.DialogueText: They look fresh all right...
Entries.DisplayPattern: They look fresh all right...

Entries.DialogueText: I'll take the whole lot! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll take the whole lot!

Entries.DialogueText: With a discount for the extra labor, of course...
Entries.DisplayPattern: With a discount for the extra labor, of course...

Entries.DialogueText: Looks like we got 'em all...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Looks like we got 'em all...

Entries.DialogueText: Psst... {Farmer_Name}... Don't tell Willy, but I'll be doing a special on crab cakes at the saloon for the next few days...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Psst... ... Don't tell Willy, but I'll be doing a special on crab cakes at the saloon for the next few days...

Entries.DialogueText: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor Lewis. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor Lewis.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.

Entries.DialogueText: Working four grills simultaneously is hard work! There's a large and hungry crowd to cater to today. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Working four grills simultaneously is hard work! There's a large and hungry crowd to cater to today.

Entries.DialogueText: I put a little dash of my zesty sauce in each patty. *wink*
Entries.DisplayPattern: I put a little dash of my zesty sauce in each patty. *wink*

Entries.DialogueText: It's a lot of fun to cook with pumpkin. Such an interesting fruit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a lot of fun to cook with pumpkin. Such an interesting fruit.

Entries.DialogueText: Carving pumpkins is a talent of mine. I usually do most of the Jack-O-Lanterns for everyone in town.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Carving pumpkins is a talent of mine. I usually do most of the Jack-O-Lanterns for everyone in town.

Entries.DialogueText: All I ask in return is to keep the seeds... sprinkle a little cinnamon sugar on those puppies and you've got yourself a golden snack! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: All I ask in return is to keep the seeds... sprinkle a little cinnamon sugar on those puppies and you've got yourself a golden snack!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope everyone's enjoying the food... I've been cooking for days to get everything ready.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope everyone's enjoying the food... I've been cooking for days to get everything ready.

Entries.DialogueText: Fried eggs, boiled eggs, poached eggs, deviled eggs, scrambled eggs, chocolate eggs... you name it! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fried eggs, boiled eggs, poached eggs, deviled eggs, scrambled eggs, chocolate eggs... you name it!

Entries.DialogueText: Shh... don't tell anyone, but I tried something different this year... Duck eggs in the custard! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shh... don't tell anyone, but I tried something different this year... Duck eggs in the custard!

Entries.DialogueText: Frog season is really starting to pick up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Frog season is really starting to pick up.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you tried the dandelion salad? I prepared it fresh right here! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you tried the dandelion salad? I prepared it fresh right here!

Entries.DialogueText: These blasted sand-flies keep landing on the food!
Entries.DisplayPattern: These blasted sand-flies keep landing on the food!

Entries.DialogueText: One bad ingredient can ruin the whole soup... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: One bad ingredient can ruin the whole soup...

Entries.DialogueText: 'Moonlight Jellies'... I wonder how they taste? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 'Moonlight Jellies'... I wonder how they taste?

Entries.DialogueText: I would never try it, of course! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I would never try it, of course!

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* Ahh... the fresh smell of the ocean never fails to satisfy. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* Ahh... the fresh smell of the ocean never fails to satisfy.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a fine art, making candy canes. You've really got to search far and wide for the best ingredients. They aren't easy to come by these days! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a fine art, making candy canes. You've really got to search far and wide for the best ingredients. They aren't easy to come by these days!

Entries.DialogueText: I usually use Fern Island Ringfruit for my premier canes, you know. You can't beat that bright red coloring... And it's all natural!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I usually use Fern Island Ringfruit for my premier canes, you know. You can't beat that bright red coloring... And it's all natural!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you want to know the secret to my deluxe double-canes? Okay, but you've got to promise absolute secrecy. *whisper* It's a drop of vanilla in the white candy to complement the cherry flavor. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you want to know the secret to my deluxe double-canes? Okay, but you've got to promise absolute secrecy. *whisper* It's a drop of vanilla in the white candy to complement the cherry flavor.

Entries.DialogueText: Of course, peppermint candy canes are the standard, and I always make a healthy batch of those as well.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Of course, peppermint candy canes are the standard, and I always make a healthy batch of those as well.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you look like you're falling asleep. Are you okay? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you look like you're falling asleep. Are you okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Eat! Eat, while it's still fresh and hot. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Eat! Eat, while it's still fresh and hot.

Entries.DialogueText: I could go on and on about my new method of making candy canes... but I'll spare you the details this year! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I could go on and on about my new method of making candy canes... but I'll spare you the details this year!

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry there's no food.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry there's no food.

Entries.DialogueText: Just wait until the Feast of the Winter Star. You'll be stuffed for days.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just wait until the Feast of the Winter Star. You'll be stuffed for days.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been spending too much time holed up inside, watching Gridball... it's good to get outside in the crisp winter air.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been spending too much time holed up inside, watching Gridball... it's good to get outside in the crisp winter air.

Entries.DialogueText: You're giving this... to me? I'm speechless.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're giving this... to me? I'm speechless.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, goodness! Are you sure?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, goodness! Are you sure?

Entries.DialogueText: No, no, no...
Entries.DisplayPattern: No, no, no...

Entries.DialogueText: This is absolute junk. I'm offended.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is absolute junk. I'm offended.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, that's sweet. Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, that's sweet. Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: I saw a commercial for this on the TV. It looks really funny!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw a commercial for this on the TV. It looks really funny!

Entries.DialogueText: As an amateur connoisseur, the weird obsession with gluten-based food was hilarious. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: As an amateur connoisseur, the weird obsession with gluten-based food was hilarious.

Entries.DialogueText: It doesn't feel like the holidays until you've seen '{0}'!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It doesn't feel like the holidays until you've seen '{0}'!

Entries.DialogueText: That was heartwarming... and somehow they make that fabled fruit seem so delicious. I'd love to taste it one day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was heartwarming... and somehow they make that fabled fruit seem so delicious. I'd love to taste it one day.

Entries.DialogueText: They say this movie is 'unconventional'... does that mean it's bad? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: They say this movie is 'unconventional'... does that mean it's bad?

Entries.DialogueText: What was the point of that one? I don't get it. Maybe I'm too old. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What was the point of that one? I don't get it. Maybe I'm too old.

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* *sniff* ... I smell something delicious...
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* *sniff* ... I smell something delicious...

Entries.DialogueText: Not bad at all. I'm really glad I came!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not bad at all. I'm really glad I came!

Entries.DialogueText: Normally I provide all the food for town festivals. But not today! It's nice to be able to relax. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Normally I provide all the food for town festivals. But not today! It's nice to be able to relax.

Entries.DialogueText: In the mood for something delicious?
Entries.DisplayPattern: In the mood for something delicious?

Entries.DialogueText: Come in, come in!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Come in, come in!

Entries.DialogueText: Need a cold drink?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Need a cold drink?

Entries.DialogueText: What can I get for ya?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What can I get for ya?

Entries.DialogueText: It's cold outside but the coffee's hot!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's cold outside but the coffee's hot!

Entries.DialogueText: Need a hot meal?
